en-US.summary: An application which easily helps to increase your quick thinking skills in mathematics
en-US.name: Math Quiz
en-US.description: How many times you've been in the situation, where you had to calculate something in your head quickly, not having a phone in your pocket, or being aware, that your friends will laugh at you when you start typing 16 + 22 into your phone? With this application you will need just 5 minuts per day to dramatically expand your quick thinking capabilities. Game offers you 4 levels of difficulties (easy, medium, hard, extreme), so game can be helpful for everyone - from slow-thinkers to math geeks. Just remember. Math is the same as running, or yoga, or baseball. First day is hard, but no matter how old you are, every time you work with it you'll get more comfortable. Over time you can become a master of any study with just a bit of hard work and patience every day.
